branchCategory.name: PS1000, Compact Electronic Pressure Switch with Fitting Plug, LED Indicator
branchCategory.description: <p>PS1000 is a compact pressure switch providing a digital output signal.  The switch is set with a trimmer rotating through a 220 of range using a precision screwdriver.  A red LED lights up when the output signal is ON.  Insert the switch port into a one touch fitting to monitor pressure.  The PS1000 monitors positive pressure, with the signal ON when pressure is above the set point.  The PS1000 can measure the pressure of any non-corrosive, non-flammable gas.  PS1000 is RoHS and optionally CE compliant, with an IP40 enclosure.</p>

breadCrumb.name: PS1000, Compact Electronic Pressure Switch with Fitting Plug, LED Indicator
